Pre-Game Insights: The Indiana Pacers are 2-2 against division opponents with a 5-10 record in games decided by 10 or more points.
The Milwaukee Bucks are 5-5 against the rest of the division with a 5-7 record against teams above.500.
The Pacers have a higher shooting percentage (48.8%) compared to the Bucks' defensive field goal percentage (45.3%).
Tyrese Haliburton is averaging 17.8 points and 8.7 assists for the Pacers, while Giannis Antetokounmpo is scoring 32.7 points and averaging 11.6 rebounds for the Bucks.
Others: Pacers injuries include Aaron Nesmith (ankle), Isaiah Jackson (calf), and James Wiseman (calf). Bucks injuries include AJ Johnson (illness) and Giannis Antetokounmpo (illness).
